message.content:
cs.SI, cs.DL, cs.ST, cs.CY, cs.SD

The paper focuses on identifying territorial scientific specializations in Italy using a bibliometric approach based on scientific production. This falls under the scope of several arXiv CS sub-categories, including cs.SI (Social and Information Networks), cs.DL (Digital Libraries), cs.ST (Statistics), cs.CY (Computers and Society), and cs.SD (Software Engineering). However, given the emphasis on bibliometrics and scientific production, cs.SI and cs.DL are the most likely sub-categories. cs.ST and cs.CY are also relevant due to the statistical analysis and societal implications of the research, while cs.SD may be less likely but still applicable due to the use of data analysis techniques.
